pkgmetadata.longdescription: Oh-my-zsh is a collection of zsh plugins and themes. Plugins may help in autocompletion, add aliases, or add additional features to the command line experience. Themes change the way the command line is presented turning a plain left hand side in more status reporting display or more stylistic fancy look. Themes may report information about local copy of a repository.
